thread.title: Brendon
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Brendon

author: Brendon
title: Brendon
text:
I was initially nervous about what I was going to receive because the price was so good. The product was also being shipped from Hong Kong.
I received exactly what I ordered. Genuine Ray-Bans all original packaging brand new. The delivery also only took a 2-3 days.
Excellent thanks.
